short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Clean New Tab Page with a focus on privacy, simplicity and customizability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT:

You need to accept the new tab change notification from Chrome otherwise the extension does nothing and will be disabled.

Calm New Tab is a feature-rich extension that transforms your new tab page into a versatile feed based on your interests. Subscribe to your favorite feeds to stay up to date. Get the feed without all the tracking.

Collects no data. You decide what RSS feeds you want to subscribe to. Pulls the background image from Bing. 

Key Features:

Integrated RSS reader: Subscribe to your favorite RSS feeds and receive the latest updates directly on your new tab page.

Most visited sites: Quickly access your top 10 most visited sites, displayed as cards with favicons and sitenames.
Reader view: Click on any RSS feed card to open a clean, reader-friendly view of the content using readability.js.
